Detailed Description

template<class T>
class wxExStatistics< T >

Offers base statistics.

All statistics involve a key value pair, where the key is a wxString, and the value a template.

Member Function Documentation

template<class T>
void wxExStatistics< T >::Clear (  )  [inline]

Clears the items.

If you have Shown the statistics the window is updated as well.

template<class T>
const wxString wxExStatistics< T >::Get (  )  const [inline]

Gets all items as a string.

All items are returned as a string, with newlines separating items.

T  value 
) [inline]

Sets key to value.

If you have Shown the statistics the window is updated as well.

template<class T>
wxExGrid* wxExStatistics< T >::Show ( wxWindow *  parent,
bool  hide_row_labels = true,
bool  hide_col_labels = true,
wxWindowID  id = wxID_ANY 
) [inline]

Shows the statistics as a grid window on the parent, and specify whether to show row labels (i.e.

row numbers) and col labels (Item, Value). Returns the window that is created, or is activated, if it already was created. You can also the id of the grid component.
